articles.author: Pia Singh
articles.title: Stock futures are little changed after rally in banks and tech lifts major averages: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: Semiconductor and bank stocks helped lift the broad market higher on Thursday.
articles.content:
Stock futures were near the flatline Thursday night after a rally in banks and tech names boosted the major averages.

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: SC measles outbreak has gone berserk: 124 cases since Friday, 409 quarantined - Ars Technica
articles.description: On Jan. 6, there were 211 cases. The outbreak, which began in October, is now at 434.

articles.author: University of Colorado at Boulder
articles.title: An earthquake on a chip: New tech could make smartphones smaller, faster - Tech Xplore
articles.description: A team of engineers has made major strides in generating the tiniest earthquakes imaginable. The team's device, known as a surface acoustic wave phonon laser, could one day help scientists make more sophisticated versions of chips in cellphones and other wire…
